Adjectif Order.question: He always carries his _ _ _ briefcase to work

Shark tank vocab.question: equity
Shark tank vocab.answer: ownership in a company, often given to investors in exchange for funding / propriété dans une entreprise, souvent donnée aux investisseurs en échange de financement

Shark tank vocab.question: valuation
Shark tank vocab.answer: the estimated worth of a company / (trad : valorisation) la valeur estimée d'une entreprise

Shark tank vocab.question: angel investor
Shark tank vocab.answer: an angel investor gives money to a new business in exchange for equity or convertible debt (also called informal investor, seed investor or business angel) / un 'angel investor' donne de l'argent à une nouvelle entreprise en échange d'équité ou de dette convertible

Shark tank vocab.question: debpt
Shark tank vocab.answer: What you owe / (trad : dette) ce que vous devez

Shark tank vocab.question: gross revenue
Shark tank vocab.answer: the total revenue a business earns before deducting expenses / (trad : revenue brut) le revenu total qu'une entreprise gagne avant de déduire les dépenses

Shark tank vocab.question: net income
Shark tank vocab.answer: the profit remaining after all expenses have been deducted from gross revenue / (trad : revenu net) le bénéfice restant après que toutes les dépenses ont été déduites du revenu brut

Shark tank vocab.question: margin
Shark tank vocab.answer: a company's profit from its operations, calculated by substracting total expenses from total revenue / (trad : marge) le bénéfice d'une entreprise provenant de ses opérations, calculé en soustrayant les dépenses totales des revenus totaux

Shark tank vocab.question: ROI
Shark tank vocab.answer: Return on Investment, a measure of the profitability of an investment relative to its cost / (trad : retour sur investissement) une mesure de la rentabilité d'un investissement par rapport à son coût

Shark tank vocab.question: due diligence
Shark tank vocab.answer: the research work a business does before entering into any transaction or paper deal with a third party / (trad : diligence raisonnable) le travail de recherche qu'une entreprise effectue avant d'entrer dans une transaction ou un accord papier avec un tiers

Shark tank vocab.question: royalty
Shark tank vocab.answer: in a royalty deal, an investor gives money to a company and, in return, gets a share of the company's sales / (trad : redevance) dans un accord de redevance, un investisseur donne de l'argent à une entreprise et, en retour, obtient une part des ventes de l'entreprise

Shark tank vocab.question: stake/shares
Shark tank vocab.answer: the percentage owned in a company / (Trad : participation/parts) le pourcentage détenu dans une entreprise

Shark tank vocab.question: target audience
Shark tank vocab.answer: the specific group of people a business aims to reach with its products or services / (trad : public cible) le groupe spécifique de personnes qu'une entreprise vise à atteindre avec ses produits ou services

Shark tank vocab.question: market value
Shark tank vocab.answer: the price at which an asset would trade in a competitive market setting / (trad : valeur marchande) le prix auquel un actif serait échangé dans un marché concurrentiel

Shark tank vocab.question: intellectual property / patent
Shark tank vocab.answer: it refers to creations of the mind, such as inventions, literary and artistic works, designs, symbols, names and images used in commerce / (trad : propriété intellectuelle / brevet) cela fait référence aux créations de l'esprit, telles que les inventions, les œuvres littéraires et artistiques, les designs, les symboles, les noms et les images utilisés dans le commerce

Shark tank vocab.question: loan
Shark tank vocab.answer: money borrowed that is expected to be paid back with interest / (trad : prêt) de l'argent emprunté qui doit être remboursé avec des intérêts

Shark tank vocab.question: profit margin
Shark tank vocab.answer: a measure of how much money a company is making on its products or services after subtracting all of the direct and indirect costs involved / (trad : marge bénéficiaire) une mesure de combien d'argent une entreprise gagne sur ses produits ou services après avoir soustrait tous les coûts directs et indirects impliqués

Conditionnel.question: If you mix red and yellow, you (get) orange.
If you (touch) a flame, it burns.
If it rains, I (not go) to the park.
If I study today, I (go) to the party tonight.
If I (have) enough money, I'll buy some new shoes.
She (be) late if the train is delayed.
She'll miss the bus if she (do not) leave soon.
If I won a million dollars, I (buy) a manor house.
If I (win) the lottery, I would travel around the world.
If I had time, I (go) swimming every day.
I (buy) a new car if I got a promotion.
If I had done my homework, I (get) a good grade at the exam.
If I (know) you were in town, I would have invited you to dinner.
If I had seen her, I (tell) her the news.
If they had left earlier, they (not miss) the train.
